full_summary:
### EZ899-250263: Living Units Sprinkler Heads Replacement
#### Notice Details
* Reference number: WS4690653604-Doc4700990498
* Solicitation number: WS4690653604
* Publication date: 2024-07-24
* Tender closing date: 2024-08-15 14:00:00
* Expected contract start date: 2024-09-27

#### Baseline Details
* Contracting entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting entity address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5 
* End-user entity: Correctional Service of Canada (CSC)
* End-user entity address: 340 Laurier Ave W, Ottawa, Ontario K1P 0P9

#### Notice Details
* Notice type: Invitation to Qualify
* Procurement method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of opportunity: None
* Regions of delivery: Victoria, British Columbia, Canada

#### Tender Description
The successful contractor will provide replacement and spares for the following sprinkler heads:
* Residential pendants 155 DEG (342), including 10 spares
* Residential sidewalls 155 DEG (276), including 10 spares
* Wax-coated sidewalls 286 DEG (40), including 5 spares
* Commercial brass uprights 200 DEG (5), including 5 spares
	+ One Tyco W7 type head wrench
* Total number of heads to be replaced: 688

The work will be executed at 20 buildings within the William Head Institution located at 6000 William Head Rd, Victoria, BC. All systems must be recharged prior to contractor leaving the site. The contractor must perform and complete the work within 15 weeks of contract award notification.

The successful contractor is required to:
	+ Provide replacement and spares for the specified sprinkler heads
	+ Execute and complete the work within 15 weeks of contract award notification
	+ Recharge all systems prior to exiting the site

#### Point of Contact
Name: Ngan, Ken (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: [ken.ngan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:ken.ngan@tpsgc-pwgsc
